summary:
International experience in telecommunications (KPN, Hi, Orange, Verizon) and airline (Air France KLM) industry. Worked in different roles like information analysis, business analysis, functional design, project management, product and supplier management, service management (quality of service). 

Professional experiences: 
• telecommunications: mobile, internet, fixed.
• mobile: 3G/WiFi/IP networks, mobile applications (Orange TV and Air France App), smartphones (Android, iPhone, Windows Phone, tablets)
• broadband services: VOIP, Internet, IPTV, mobile TV
• E-Commerce / Webportal services: HTTP, XML, API, REST services, SSL, EAI, J2EE/Java, Web2.0, CMS.
• networks (fixed, mobile, broadband): VOIP, 3G, ADSL, IP, VPN
• Value Added Services (VAS): Intelligent Networks (IN), VoiceMail, Unified Messaging
• Business Support Systems (BSS): Provisioning, Order Management, Customer Care, Service, Billing
• Operations Support Systems (OSS): Network Management 
• quality assurance: ISO 9002, maintenance (ITIL), specifications (UML), Project Management (New Product Development, Prince2, RUP, SCRUM/AGILE, IREB)

Competences: 
• excellent "linking pin" between marketing and technical departments.
• broad knowledge of IT and telecommunications
• good balance in having attention for details and having a high level view as project manager
• international experience (worked in England, France, Netherlands)
• Dutch (fluent), English (fluent), French (fluent) and German (good)

Certifications: 
* IREB and Scrum Product Owner certified (PSPO-I).

certifications.name: IREB Certified Professional for Requirements Engineering

profile_positions.description:
• Feasibility study on possibility of introducing MVNOs (Mobile Virtual Network Operators) to the market in Burkina Faso. 
• The feasibility study included the following components and players: 
• Technical, juridical, economic and market survey
• Current mobile operators, candidat MVNOs, regulator.
• Role: technical translator to French. 
• Sponsor: government of Burkina Faso (telecom regulator ARCEP). 
• In cooperation with Rabion Consultancy and IMCG from Burkina Faso.
profile_positions.title: Consultant mobile telecommunications and technical translator French

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Quality of Service (QoS) of Air France mobile application and site in the DIGITAL (IT) department. 

In this team, we launch project developments (innovations) and provide operational support for the AF mobile application (iOS, Android and Windows devices) and the mobile site.  

Tasks involve: 
•	Implement, support and improve incident management process
•	Communication of mobile knowledge to other AF departments (entry point): Client helpdesk, IT Support, IT Monitoring, Marketing
•	Analysis of client incidents (smartphones, AF/KLM IT systems) 
•	Definition of improvements based on incidents and client feedback
•	Implementation and reporting on quality performance indicators
•	Implementation of monitoring tools
•	Testing of corrective and innovation releases
profile_positions.title: Quality of Service Engineer - Air France Mobile Application and Site

profile_positions.description:
Skill centre - Orange Mobile TV
Project manager Back-end systems for mobile TV Orange (France, Paris)
• Project management of innovations on back-end systems for Orange TV on mobile devices.
• Management of (external) supplier of back-end system
• Responsible project manager during phase analysis and build
• Innovations Orange TV for France, Spain, Poland, Switzerland, United-Kingdom. 
• Supporting role during phase test and implementation on production
• Techniques, methods and systems involved: REST, API, webservices, SOAP, XML, UML, AMP, Mercury QC, JMeter, Apache server, mobile devices (Android, iPhone, iPad, WP7, BlackBerry) and networks (3G, authentication server, ADSL LiveBox).
• Deliverables: requirements (docs and workshops), review and validation of commercial propositions, technical specifications, test cases, team meetings, escalation, planning, scope.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Orange Mobile TV

profile_positions.description:
Information analyst for innovative projects for E-Commerce internet portal (www.hi.nl) of KPN Mobile (NL):
• specification and technical design of services for E-commerce internet portal.
• deliverables: functional designs, technical specifications, impact studies, quick scans.
• techniques and systems involved: 
Java/J2EE, IP, HTTP(s), SSL, XML, SOAP, EAI (Tibco), Web2.0, GX WebManager, Apache TomCat, Oracle, UML.
profile_positions.title: Information Analyst

profile_positions.description:
IT Project manager of automated provisioning of VOIP phones for large business customers of Verizon Business (UK).

Managing international project team: 
• 15+ employees from EMEA, US and India
• multiple disciplines: sponsor (marketing), product management, architects, software developers, testers, operations and service delivery. 

Responsibilities in managing: 
• project finances, planning and scope with team, sponsor and management
• progress, risks, issues and escalation with management and sponsor
• team meetings (progress, issues, design and test plan reviews, test progress, User Acceptance Testing (UAT), problem resolution)
  
Deliverables: 
• project management from begin to end - requirement, analysis, design, development, test to successful implementation according to planning, scope and budget.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Design and impact study for VOIP service: video calling from UMTS handheld to VOIP PC client

Responsibilities: 
• Manage and define requirements with marketing
• Manage and define best solution for these requirements with project manager, network architects (mobile, IP), designers and suppliers. 
• Set up and define RFQ and meetings with suppliers to elaborate solution. 
• Define impact of solution options including planning and budget. 

Deliverables: impact analysis, architectural design, requirements, RFQ.
profile_positions.title: Information Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Tasks: 
• Process design and implementation for provisioning of VOIP and IPTV service of ISP Planet/HetNet
• Training of ISP agents for provisioning of VOIP and IPTV service

Deliverables: process designs, training and documentation (user guides).
profile_positions.title: Process designer

profile_positions.description:
Designer for provisioning, billing, customer care & service of VOIP service:
• Impact analysis & design of provisioning, billing, customer care & service (BSS and organisation) for VOIP service . 
• Design of provisioning use cases for VOIP communication service. 

Deliverables: quick scan, impact analysis, use cases provisioning.
profile_positions.title: Information Analyst
